component.name: Rectangle01
component.script: function init() m.top.setFocus(true) m.myLabel = m.top.findNode("myLabel") m.myLabel.font.size=20 m.myLabel.color="0xCCCCCC" labelCounter = m.top.findNode("labelCounter") labelCounter.font.size=50 labelCounter.text="0" print "here is a counter with text = " + labelCounter.text end function function onKeyEvent(key as String, press as Boolean) as Boolean m.showMeLabel = m.top.findNode("showMeLabel") if (key = "up") then m.showMeLabel.visible = true m.showMeLabel.text = m.showMeLabel.text + " and more" Print "you clicked up" end if if (key = "down") then m.showMeLabel.visible = false m.showMeLabel.text = "" Print "you clicked down" end if return true end function
